forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Thunderday III: Strike Force Eagle

comments.text: It's 1985, I'm sitting on my Commodore while watching a VHS, and just hit the clunky beige Deploy button for v165.3 (you're on [version])! Thx everyone & rock on!
The "Show Body Part Counts" option in the Me settings now also adds info on how many parts need to strict-sync. More info on that is on the button help and anyland.com/optimization
Rotating a holdable in your hand while in desktop mode is now properly intuitive!
We fixed an issue where after attaching a body part, it could be context-lasered to get to its original placement dialog! Thx Zid!
There's new commands "Reset legs to default/ body default" (putting legs to their universal default, or the auto-equipped body default, defaulting to universal)! Thx Rusty & Nic!
The auto-complete help for the reset commands wasn't properly showing all requirements, that's fixed now! we also fixed an issue on the area copy labels.
And update 165.4: There's the new body tell "When told by body both hands triggered"!

thread.latestCommentText: And update 165.4: There's the new body tell, "When told by body both hands triggered then"!
